info.description:
Cloudistics API Python Client
=============================
.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/Cloudistics/cloudistics-python.svg?branch=master
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/Cloudistics/cloudistics-python

.. image:: https://landscape.io/github/Cloudistics/cloudistics-python/master/landscape.svg
    :target: https://landscape.io/github/Cloudistics/cloudistics-python/master

.. image:: https://api.codeclimate.com/v1/badges/e8fe56af24466518d46d/maintainability
    :target: https://codeclimate.com/github/Cloudistics/cloudistics-python/maintainability
    :alt: Maintainability

.. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/cloudistics.svg
    :target: http://badge.fury.io/py/cloudistics

.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/github/Cloudistics/cloudistics-python/badge.svg?branch=master
    :target: https://coveralls.io/github/Cloudistics/cloudistics-python?branch=master


This library provides a simple Python client to interact with
`Cloudistics API <https://github.com/cloudistics/REST-API>`_.

A command-line interface is also included and can be used to manage various Cloudistics products and services.


Documentation
-------------
Documentation for the Python client is available at
http://cloudistics-python.readthedocs.org/en/latest/index.html.

Additional API documentation can be found on Github:

* `Cloudistics API reference <https://github.com/cloudistics/REST-API>`_

Installation
------------
Install via pip:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install cloudistics


Or you can install from source. Download source and run:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ python setup.py install

Mac
~~~
Mac (through 10.13.2) ships with six-1.4.1 and can't be upgraded. To work around this, install like below:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install cloudistics --ignore-installed six

The most up-to-date version of this library can be found on the Cloudistics GitHub public repositories at
http://github.com/cloudistics. For questions regarding the use of this library please post to Stack Overflow
at https://stackoverflow.com/ and tag your posts with “Cloudistics” so our team can easily find your post. To report
a bug with this library please create an Issue on github.

InsecurePlatformWarning Notice
------------------------------
This library relies on the `requests <http://docs.python-requests.org/>`_ library to make HTTP requests. On Python
versions below Python 2.7.9, requests has started emitting a security warning (InsecurePlatformWarning) due to
insecurities with creating SSL connections. To resolve this, upgrade to Python 2.7.9+ or follow the instructions
here: http://stackoverflow.com/a/29099439.

Getting Help
------------
Bugs and feature requests about this library should have a
`GitHub issue <https://github.com/Cloudistics/cloudistics-python/issues>`_ opened about them.

Issues with the Cloudistics API itself should be addressed by opening a
`Support ticket <https://support.cloudistics.com/>`_.

System Requirements
-------------------
* Python 2.7, 3.4, 3.5 or 3.6.
* A valid Cloudistics API token.

Python Packages
---------------
* six >= 1.7.0
* prettytable >= 0.7.0
* click >= 5
* requests >= 2.7.0
* prompt_toolkit >= 0.53
* pygments >= 2.0.0
* urllib3 >= 1.22
